actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 5146 of the Revised Statutes with respect to the qualifications of directors of national banks.

summary.text: States that an otherwise qualified director of a national bank may satisfy the requirement that he own capital stock, having a specified value, of the bank of which he is the director by owning stock (having that same value) of a bank holding company which controls the national bank of which he is the director.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5146 of the Revised Statutes with respect to the qualifications of directors of national banks.
